variable.tooltip: Series7,8 will give about 1 scale mph at speed step 1% on DT6XX with factory default CV10=00, 127 = step 1 will be about 1/2 scale mph

variable.label: (1=PW6, 0=PW7)(Selects logic to follow changes in motor speed)
